insert into draw (prodUid, prodName, prodTel, drawPrice, drawName, drawStatus, authName, urlHd, urlSimple, desc, ownCount, ownFinishCount, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{produid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{drawname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlhd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlsimple,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownfinishcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update draw set prodUid = #{produid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prodName = #{prodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prodTel = #{prodtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawPrice = #{drawprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drawName = #{drawname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawStatus = #{drawstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authName = #{authname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urlHd = #{urlhd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urlSimple = #{urlsimple,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownCount = #{owncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ownFinishCount = #{ownfinishcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opName = #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opId = #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, prodUid, prodName, prodTel, drawPrice, drawName, drawStatus, authName, urlHd, urlSimple, desc, ownCount, ownFinishCount, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from draw where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
